inkball

类 Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.Ball

  • public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
    The Ball class represents a ball in the game with properties such as position, velocity, and color. It handles movement, collision detection, and rendering of the ball.

    • 构造器概要

      Constructor for the Ball class.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Ball

        public Ball(float x,
            float y,
            java.lang.String color)
        Constructor for the Ball class. Initializes the ball's position and color, and sets random velocities.
        参数:
        x - The initial x-coordinate of the ball.
        y - The initial y-coordinate of the ball.
        color - The color of the ball.

        返回:
        The color of the ball.

        Sets the color of the ball.
        参数:
        color - The new color to set for the ball.

      • isRemove

        public boolean isRemove()
        Checks if the ball is marked for removal.
        返回:
        True if the ball is marked for removal, false otherwise.

      • removeBall

        public void removeBall()
        Marks the ball for removal.

      • isAttract

        public boolean isAttract()
        Checks if the ball is attracted.
        返回:
        True if the ball is being attracted, false otherwise.

      • attractBall

        public void attractBall(boolean attracted)
        Sets the attraction state of the ball.
        参数:
        attracted - True to attract the ball, false otherwise.

      • setShrinking

        public void setShrinking(boolean shrinking)
        Sets the shrinking state of the ball.
        参数:
        shrinking - True to set the ball as shrinking, false otherwise.

      • isShrinking

        public boolean isShrinking()
        Checks if the ball is currently shrinking.
        返回:
        True if the ball is shrinking, false otherwise.

      • shrink

        public void shrink(float distance)
        Shrinks the ball based on the distance from a hole.
        参数:
        distance - The distance from the hole used to determine the new radius.

      • isCaptured

        public boolean isCaptured()
        Checks if the ball is captured.
        返回:
        True if the ball is captured, false otherwise.

      • capturedBall

        public void capturedBall(boolean captured)
        Sets the captured state of the ball.
        参数:
        captured - True to capture the ball, false otherwise.

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition()
        Updates the position of the ball based on its velocity. This method should be called every frame to move the ball.

      • checkCollision

        public void checkCollision()
        Checks for collisions with the boundaries of the application window. If the ball hits a boundary, its velocity is reversed.

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Draws the ball on the application canvas. Uses the ball's color to retrieve the appropriate image from the application.
        参数:
        app - The main application instance used for rendering.
